name: The 4 Aces
description:
A quick card game to play on the bus, plane, train, car (as a passenger!), or at school (between classes of course!). Very addicting! Great to play whenever you have just a minutes of free time! Each hand can be played in 60-90 seconds!

Deal 4 cards... if the topmost card in a pile is of the same suit but lesser rank than the top card in another pile you can tap to remove it! Or tap a top card to move it to an open pile to free up those below it!

See if you can reach the max score of 48 cards removed (leaving only 'The 4 Aces')!
